level.text: Each violation of this chapter by a taxicab company, independent owner, or taxicab operator shall subject the violator to:
Impoundment of a vehicle operating in violation of this chapter;
Confiscation of an MTS unit or unapproved equipment used for taxi metering in violation of this chapter;
Suspension, revocation, or non-renewal of such person’s license or operating authority; or
Any combination of the sanctions listed in (a)-(d) of this subsection.
A PSP that violates a provision of this chapter shall be subject to the penalties in Chapter 4.
